text: HY is a Japanese rock music band formed in year 2000 by five high school friends in Okinawa. Their name comes from the initials of their hometown, Higashi Yakena. The band became popular by performing music in the streets. Their first album Departure (Okinawa-only) sold out immediately. In 2002, the band did a live performance with American group, Linkin Park. == Members == * Hideyuki Sinzato born December 4, 1983 - guitar, vocals, rap * Syun Naka born October 5, 1983 - drums, rap * Sinsuke Kyoda born July 17, 1983 - bass * Izumi Nakasone born January 11, 1983 - keyboard, vocals * Yuuhei Miyazato born February 1, 1984 - guitar Category:Japanese rock bands Category:2000 establishments in Japan
title: HY
